text: Michael Dixon (born 14 March 1937) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre forward. ==Career== Born in Willesden, Dixon played for Hitchin Town, Luton Town, Coventry City and Cambridge United. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Hitchin Town F.C. players Category:Luton Town F.C. players Category:Coventry City F.C. players Category:Cambridge United F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football forwards
title: Mike Dixon (footballer, born 1937)
